item.title: Objectives
item.description: Leverage knowledge of Promises to build an application that makes an asynchronous request to a 3rd party API

item.title: Instructions
item.description: Overview You are tasked with building an application that leverages the Githup API to list the public repositories of a given Github user Instructions 1) Generate a personal access token by following the instructions here 2) Fork and Clone the starter code The starter code for this code along is hosted on Github, see the url below: Lab: Github API App

item.title: Requirements
item.description: Requirements Requirement #1: App UI The user interface should contain a single form input and a submit button (the starter code already provides the UI) Requirement #2: Make the API Request When users enter in a valid Github username into the input field and the submits the form, the app should use the the List user repositories endpoint to return a list of all public repositories associated with the Github username Requirement #3: Display Data Once you successfully GET data from the API, display list of the repositories as links.
